mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (factory_id, name, employ_id, password, dept_id, position, role) VALUES (#{factoryId}, #{name}, #{employId}, #{password}, #{departmentId}, #{position}, #{role});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user as u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM USER as u;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER AS u LEFT JOIN FACTORY AS f ON f.factory_id = u.factory_id LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT AS d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id
WHERE f.factory_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.employ_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.position LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.role LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE f.factory_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') u.employ_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') d.dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') u.position LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') u.role LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
;
